artist: Attributed to Adriaen van der Werffe
dimension:
8 3/8 x 16 1/8 in. (21.27 x 40.96 cm) (sheet, irregular)
14 3/4 x 21 7/8 in. (37.47 x 55.56 cm) (outer frame)
provenance: (Rodman Gallery, New York, sold to Hillstrom, 1945, for $15); Rev. Richard Lewis Hillstrom, Edina, Minn., until 2012; given to MIA)
text: This brush drawing showing the raising of Lazarus has long been attributed to Adriaen van der Werff, a major Dutch classicist active in the late 17th and early 18th centuries. We have been unable to confirm the attribution, and the handling seems remarkably lose for such a fastidious artist.
title: The Raising of Lazarus
